text.title: Malaysia to investigate suspected plane debris washed ashore on several Maldives islands
text.head: Malaysia to investigate suspected plane debris washed ashore on several Maldives islands
Related news

list.item: "Suspected plane debris washes ashore on several Maldives islands" — Wikinews, August 9, 2015

text.head: Sources

list.item: Laura Zhou. "'No absolute certainty yet' Reunion Island wing piece part of missing flight MH370" — South China Morning Post , August 10, 2015
